/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Prove that |sinh z| ≤ (1/2) e^{|z|} and |cosh z| ≤ (1/2) e^{|z|}. Translate into Lean4 (import Mathlib at top) and end each statement with := by sorry. -/
import Mathlib
open scoped Topology Filter
open Set
open Lean Meta Qq

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Prove that |sinh z| ≤ (1/2) e^{|z|} and |cosh z| ≤ (1/2) e^{|z|}. Translate into Lean4 (import Mathlib at top) and end each stat

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Prove that |sinh z| ≤ (1/2) e^{|z|}. -/
theorem abs_sinh_le_exp (z : ℂ) :
  Complex.abs (Complex.sinh z) ≤ (1 / 2 : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by sorry

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Prove that |cosh z| ≤ (1/2) e^{|z|}. -/
theorem abs_cosh_le_exp (z : ℂ) :
  Complex.abs (Complex.cosh z) ≤ (1 / 2 : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by sorry
